none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2015-07-diaspora/extracted/diaspora/05 Cão de Guarda (Policias Mortos Não Espancam)

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 16, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
That box of tapes I got from Brasil last year just keeps on delivering. Chaotic and high energy early '00s fastcore/crust from São Paulo with a singer that is even more off the rails than the frenetic drummer. Seven songs in a hair under ten minutes - shouts, screams, blasts and moshes...pretty much all of the things you need. LIBERDADE
//1.bp.blogspot.com/-6pmuIcDhYHg/Vab9cueW-XI/AAAAAAAAMxE/yRxd70d-6uE/s1600/diaspora%2Bcover.jpg //3.bp.blogspot.com/-kRiPIGDF-0U/VacyjKhdm1I/AAAAAAAAMxU/QOVniIFXi2s/s1600/diaspora%2Bimg.jpg
